short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's sorta like Mad Libs, except a) it's not affiliated with that word game, and b) it (theoretically) works on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take basically any webpage and turn it into a fun fill-in-the-blanks word game!

Just go to your favorite site, find a good article, and click the extension to begin.  Fill in the inputs that appear, then click the extension again to see your hilarious results.

This is an open-source project.  Check out the repo to contribute!

https://github.com/xaroth8088/fill-in-the-blanks

Note: Does not work will all websites, and is especially tuned for English-language content.  News stories on https://www.npr.org/ tend to work pretty well with this extension.
